## A vignette for ecostructure 2.0 coming soon

The ecostructure model is described in detail in our paper:  

* White, A.E., Dey, K.K., Mohan, D., Stephens M., and Price, T.D. Regional influences on community structure across the tropical-temperate divide. Nature Communications. 2019. 10 (1). 2646. [https://doi.org/10.1038/s41467-019-10253-6](https://doi.org/10.1038/s41467-019-10253-6)

A new github repo containing ecostructure 2.0 will soon be available on the Data Science Lab github page.
